言葉遣い: (ことばづかい) - speech; expression; wording; language
言行一致: (げんこういっち) - (yoji) acting up to one's words
言行不一致: (げんこうふいっち) - inconsistency between one's words and actions; insincerity; saying one thing and doing another
言行録: (げんこうろく) - record of a person's words and deeds
言行齟齬: (げんこうそご) - (yoji) inconsistency of speech and action; failing to act up to one's words; not practicing what one preaches
言表す: (いいあらわす) - to express (in words); to confess
言触らす: (いいふらす) - to spread a rumor; to spread a rumour; to talk about
言言句句: (げんげんくく) - (yoji) every single word and phrase; each and every word
言訳がたつ: (いいわけがたつ) - to have an excuse
言訳が立たない: (いいわけがたたない) - admitting no excuse
言語に絶する: (げんごにぜっする) - to be beyond words; to defy description
言語トランスレータ: (げんごトランスレータ) - language translator
言語プロセッサ: (げんごプロセッサ) - language processor
言語中枢: (げんごちゅうすう) - speech center; speech centre
言語処理系: (げんごしょりけい) - language processor
言語化: (げんごか) - verbalizing; putting into words
言語同断: (ごんごどうだん) - (yoji) outrageous; preposterous; scandalous; inexcusable; absurd; execrable
言語地図: (げんごちず) - linguistic map; linguistic atlas
言語学的実在論: (げんごがくてきじつざいろん) - linguistic realism
言語学的観念論: (げんごがくてきかんねんろん) - linguistic conceptualism
言語対象: (げんごたいしょう) - language object
言語心理学: (げんごしんりがく) - linguistic psychology; psycholinguistics (esp. from a psychological standpoint)
言語接触: (げんごせっしょく) - language contact
言語教育: (げんごきょういく) - language education
言語構成要素: (げんごこうせいようそ) - language construct
言語活動: (げんごかつどう) - linguistic activity; language (as defined by Saussure; langue and parole)
言語生活: (げんごせいかつ) - linguistic aspects of life; linguistic behaviour
言語療法: (げんごりょうほう) - speech therapy
言語相対説: (げんごそうたいせつ) - theory of linguistic relativity
言語知識: (げんごちしき) - knowledge of language
言語社会学: (げんごしゃかいがく) - linguistic sociology
言語能力: (げんごのうりょく) - (linguistic) competence; language capability
言語行動: (げんごこうどう) - verbal behaviour; language behaviour
言語要素: (げんごようそ) - language construct; entity
言語論的転回: (げんごろんてきてんかい) - linguistic turn
言語資料: (げんごしりょう) - corpus; linguistic data; text corpus
言語道断: (ごんごどうだん) - (yoji) outrageous; preposterous; scandalous; inexcusable; absurd; execrable
言語道斷: (ごんごどうだん) - (yoji) outrageous; preposterous; scandalous; inexcusable; absurd; execrable
言語野: (げんごや) - language area of the cortex; speech centre (center)
言語障害: (げんごしょうがい) - speech impediment; speech disorder
言語障害者: (げんごしょうがいしゃ) - speech-impaired person; person with a speech impediment; mute
言誤る: (いいあやまる) - to say by mistake; to make a slip of the tongue
言論: (げんろん) - (one's) speech; expression of views; discussion
言論の自由: (げんろんのじゆう) - free speech; freedom of speech
言論を封殺する: (げんろんをふうさつする) - to suppress the freedom of speech
言論弾圧: (げんろんだんあつ) - suppression of speech; suppression of dissent; censorship
言論機関: (げんろんきかん) - organ of public opinion
言論界: (げんろんかい) - the press; journalism; fourth estate
言論統制: (げんろんとうせい) - regulation of freedom of speech
言諭す: (いいさとす) - to explain in an easy-to-understand manner
言負かす: (いいまかす) - to talk (a person) down; to confute
言負ける: (いいまける) - to lose a quarrel; to lose an argument; to be talked down
言責: (げんせき) - responsibility for one's words
言足す: (いいたす) - to say something additional; to add (to what was said before)
言辛い: (いいづらい) - difficult to speak about
言込める: (いいこめる) - to talk down; to argue down
言返す: (いいかえす) - to talk back/to answer back/to retort; to say over/to repeat words/to say repeatedly
言述: (げんじゅつ) - discourse; expression of thoughts, ideas, etc.
言送る: (いいおくる) - to send a message; to write to
言逃れる: (いいのがれる) - to explain away; to talk one's way out of; to excuse oneself; to evade
言通す: (いいとおす) - to persist in saying
言過ぎる: (いいすぎる) - to talk or say too much; to go too far; to overstate; to exaggerate
言過ごす: (いいすごす) - to talk or say too much; to go too far; to overstate; to exaggerate
言違い: (いいちがい) - slip of the tongue; misstatement
言違える: (いいちがえる) - to say by mistake; to make a slip of the tongue
言開く: (いいひらく) - to justify; to explain; to vindicate
言霊: (ことだま) - soul of language; power of words
言魂: (ことだま) - soul of language; power of words
